## Timeline
All parts (except first intro) come with small exercises and breaks between.

- **Introduction to [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/) concepts** (15 minutes)  

- **Day 1 - Tidy visualisation & subsetting** (~ 3 hours incl. breaks) 
  - Potting data with [ggplot2](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) (~1.5 hours) 
  - Sub-setting data with [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/) (~1.5 hours)  
  - Chaining commands with the pipe `%>%` (~15 min)  
  
- **Day 2 - Tidy data wrangling & reshaping** (~ 3 hours incl. breaks) 
  - Adding and altering variables with [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/)  (~1.5 hours)  
  - Pivoting data with [tidyr](https://tidyr.tidyverse.org/) (~1.5 hours) 

- **Day 3 - Tidy data summaries** (~ 3 hours incl. breaks)   
  - Grouped summaries with [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/) (~1.5 hours)  
  - Reshaping & grouping data for summaries and visualisation (~1.5 hours)
